name: Ape Rush
description:
A tsunami is approaching rapidly. You are the ALPHA APE and you must rescue all the encaged apes in the path of the tsunami and push forward together. The more apes, the more powerful and fast you charge. The fate of all apes depends on you. DO NOT FALTER!

HOW TO PLAY

Break your fellow apes out of their cages to charge faster, and collect powerful bananas to enhance your speed. Avoid the tsunami for as long as possible and try not to hit any obstacles or you'll slow down.

CONTROLS

Move - A/D or left/right arrow keys
Pause game - Escape

TOOLS USED

- Unity 2020.2.4f1
- Blender
- Marmoset Hexels 3
- Beepbox

This game was made in a week for the Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam.
